  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/set_wallet_emoji"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Set an emoji identifier/avatar for a wallet to make it easier to distinguish.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the set_wallet_emoji endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Set wallet emoji","required":["fingerprint"],"properties":{"emoji":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Emoji character (null to remove)"},"fingerprint":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Wallet fingerprint","example":1234567890,"minimum":0}},"title":"SetWalletEmoji"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from set_wallet_emoji","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response for emoji update","title":"SetWalletEmojiResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
